Key Arguments: The government should not be the arbiter of truth or censor dissenting opinions.
Open and honest debate is the solution to misinformation, not government intervention.
The proposed bill threatens freedom of speech and could lead to authoritarianism.
The bill represents government overreach and could regress Australia's human rights stance.
Notable Quotes: The solution is open and honest debate.
The idea that the government of the day is the highest authority on, and determiner of, truth, sends shivers down my spine.
That is not the Australia we want to pass on to the next generation.
